sections.title: Tag Index
sections.content: This index organizes all documents in the Global Memory Bank by tags, with tags grouped into logical categories.

sections.title: Tag Categories
sections.content:
Tags are organized into the following categories to improve navigation and discoverability:

1. **Project Foundation** - Tags related to project overview, summaries, and general project information
2. **Design & Architecture** - Tags related to system design, architecture patterns, and design decisions
3. **Implementation & Technology** - Tags related to code implementation, tech stack, and dependencies
4. **Documentation & Guides** - Tags related to user guides, references, and glossaries
5. **Testing & Quality** - Tags related to testing strategies, QA, and TDD
6. **Version & Releases** - Tags related to versions, releases, and changelogs
7. **Infrastructure & Operations** - Tags related to CI/CD, workflows, and automation
8. **Internationalization & Localization** - Tags related to i18n, l10n, and templates
9. **Refactoring & Technical
